question: I was wondering if you can recite the Surah Dahr and tell me it’s meaning.
answer:
QUESTION
Salam, I understand that by reciting Surah Dahr and reciting durood sharif 500 times daily, it can help one to get married. I am a 26 yr old female and wish to marry someone I have in mind. I was wondering if you can recite the Surah Dahr and tell me it?s meaning. Thank you very much.
ANSWER

the meaning of Surah Dahr.

We recommend the following English translations: Muhammad Pickthall
(Translation); Muhsin Khan (Translation); Tafseer-e-Usmani (with
commentary); Daryabadi (with commentary); Maariful Qurãn (with commentary).

NB. Any translation of the Noble Qurãn must be accompanied with the Arabic
